Posts.Content: Hi !!! I have been been having herceptin with injection since feb this year- i hate needles even now ..its nt painful at all - just relax think about sumthing nice!!! take few deep breaths and i promise u it wnt even hurt ... tell me tom night how u get on gud luck !!!
Posts.Title: Herceptin by injection

Posts.Content: I had the op chemo herceptin and nw on tamoxifen and generally doing very well in fact I shock my self with how well I am doing I feel I am blessed but I have never actually touched the side which I had the breast removed until last wel I dnt nw how it shud feel but I feel this thing only when I stand up nt when sitting ...the fear is driving me mad I have accepted in my mind it's bk  For those who have full mastectomy what shud I expect diagnosed in 2013
Posts.Title: Is it back ?

Posts.Content: Has anyone else put weight on since Herceptin  Thank god I am getting better but my lord the weight gain is baaadddd!!!
Posts.Title: Weight Gain on Herceptin

Posts.Content: Yes ur right getting better is the most important - its when ppl say " u have out the weight on "  and then "eat less" it hurts alot these ppl have no idea what we go through
Posts.Title: Weight Gain on Herceptin

Posts.Content: i had my mx last year may chemo all done but i feel i am looking for lumps i cnt compare with other side as i only have one breast... shud i go to the gp or call my breast care nurse tom morning  sumthng just dnt feel right
Posts.Title: cud it be bk ?

Posts.Content: not had the one yr check thats due in april i am having herceptin. cud it cme bk while on treatment?
Posts.Title: cud it be bk ?

Posts.Content: Thank u so much all for replies yes i will go to go in morning een first time round worst part was nt nwing but once we nw it makes its all alot easier....
Posts.Title: cud it be bk ?

Posts.Content: I can't believe how hard it is to look for work having cancer and being mum !!! i am looking for work for few hours ideally term time but it seems theres nothing at all just things like kitchen assistant which i dn't mind at all but cnt stand up for very long at all help !! is anyone else feeling like this ?
Posts.Title: looking for work after cancer
